templates.content: You can cancel your subscription by logging into your account. To log into your account, click the 'user' icon at the top right corner of the site. If you have not created an account before, create one using the email address that you used to purchase your subscription. Once logged in, you can cancel your account. Any given order needs to be cancelled 24 hours before shipment.
templates.name: How do I cancel my subscription? Can I cancel it at any time?

I hope this helps!

templates.content: Our Oi Liquid Luster is a rinse off treatment that will make your hair silkier and 6x shinier. Our Oi Oil is more so for frizz protection and leaves the hair structure protected, without weighing it down. Our Oi All In One Milk is a multi-function leave-in spray treatment that softens, detangles, controls frizz and protects the hair from heat.
templates.name: Oi Liquid Luster vs Oi Oil vs  Oi All In One Milk

templates.content: The Bollati family founded Davines in 1983 in Parma, Italy. It originally began as a research laboratory specializing in the manufacture of quality haircare and skincare products for cosmetic companies. The name "Davines" is a combination of the Bollati children's names, Davide and Stephania.
templates.name: What is the history of Davines?

templates.content: Since 2018, we've been carbon neutral on the production of packaging across all product lines. We're proud to support the non-profit EthioTrees land and forest regeneration project in Ethiopia to offset the carbon emissions from the manufacturing of our products while sustaining local agricultural communities and an easier access to clean water.
templates.name: Is Davines packaging carbon neutral?

templates.content: All our products are designed, formulated and manufactured at our headquarters and laboratories in Parma, Italy.
templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?

templates.content: You can only use your E-Gift Card to make purchases on our website, and E-Gift Cards won't be accepted at our salons.
templates.name: Can I use the E-Gift card in store/salon?

templates.content: As part of our commitment to give you the best experience, we offer a fair return policy. If you're dissatisfied with any product from our site that has been opened, you may return it for a full refund/exchange up to 30 days after the date of purchase. Keep in mind, prior authorization is required on all returns. To receive authorization and get more info on a return, please contact us at contact@davines.us Allow up to 21 days for the return to be processed, at which time a credit will be processed.
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: The best way is to visit our salon near you so a trained product stylist can play with your hair! Check them out here - https://us.davines.com/pages/salon-locator Our blog, YouTube channel and IG also offer how-to videos, tips and trend information. At the top of our website, the dropdown menu for 'hair status' can also help navigate the right products for your hair needs.

templates.content: We ship online orders with DHL Ground, DHL Priority Express and UPS 2nd Day Air; USPS as the final delivery carrier. Please allow 1 business day for orders to be processed and shipped. Shipping and delivery times depend on the shipping method and are outlined at checkout.

templates.content: The NOUNOU Shampoo is actually for bleached, permed, or relaxed hair. The rich formula gently cleanses treated hair, giving it deep nourishment, and hydration and restoring its natural softness. While the LOVE Smoothing Shampoo is for frizzy or unruly hair. It's formulated for gentle cleansing while leaving your hair with a smooth, soft and shiny look.
templates.name: What is difference between the NOUNOU shampoo and LOVE Smoothing Shampoo

templates.content:
In terms of packaging, the solid shampoo has FSC paper packaging, while the liquid one has a bio-based plastic one. Formula-wise, both the solid and the liquid shampoo contain Slow Food actives and have a high level of biodegradability, but the liquid one has a greater natural content. The Shampoo bar is perfect both for home-use and for travel-use. The liquid one, however, has 1-liter if you need to use it for your salon. 

Please note that no shampoo is perfect for all uses and under all sustainability profiles. Both the bar and the liquid can actually compliment each other! Hope it helps.
templates.name: What's the difference between a shampoo bar and a liquid one?

templates.content: Good question! OI Oil works well with dry and coarse hair adding some shine and softness to it while also detangling and fighting frizz. OI All In One Milk, on the other hand, is a leave-in spray treatment that softens, detangles, and controls frizz while also protecting your hair from the heat. Hope it helps.
templates.name: What's the difference between OI Oil and OI All In One Milk?

templates.content: The pH of Davines products varies according to the product considered. In general, our shampoos have a pH ranging from 5 to 5.8; our conditions from 3.8 to 4.8; our treatments have a pH of approximately 5. If you have any questions about the pH of a specific product, please reach out to us at contact@davines.us.
templates.name: PH of the products
